item.title: Publications
item.description: Journal Tokuda et al. 2020 Fujishiro et al. 2020 Title “FRagmentation and Evolution of dense cores Judged by ALMA (FREJA). I Inner ~1000 au structures of prestellar/protostellar cores in Taurus” Member Kazuki Tokuda, Kakeru Fujishiro, Kengo Tachihara, Tatsuyuki Takashima, Sarolta Zahorecz, Kazuya Saigo, Tomoaki Matsumoto, Yasuo Fukui, Kengo Tomida, Masahiro N. Machida, Shu-ichiro Inutsuka, Philippe Andre, Akiko Kawamura, and Toshikazu Onishi Abstruct We have performed survey-type observations in 1 mm continuum and molecular lines toward dense cores (32 prestellar + 7 protostellar) with an average density of >10$^5$ cm$^{-3}$ in the Taurus molecular clouds using the ALMA-ACA (Atacama Compact Array) stand-alone mode with an angular resolution of $\sim$6\farcs7 ($\sim$940 au).
